body: @Esdeathtatsumi Have  you read this with your ass or are you just plain stupid? The girl who has sex with the fat guy is NOT HUMAN, she is just a clone of the real girl created through an app. And since she is a clone she doesn't have a choice in the matter . So before you overanalyse and try to find some pseudo deep meaning in the porn, read it right first you moron.

Band end to girl, after all the guy can find another beautiful girl, but the girl is completely alienated and oblivious the reality that lies, believing it is good to make sex with that fat and ugly guy. The worst thing that can happen to a woman is alienation, she is not aware of what is happening to her and the choices of the choices she can make. It's like the drug addict who is not aware of what's happening to her, that's sad.
The situation of the girl is similar to that of the prisoners of Plato's allegory of the Cave.She is not aware of her situation, believes that it is paradise, when she is stuck in hell, being exploited with a fat and ugly guy.
The girl had a bad end as guy in the body of the girl in the hentai of body swap: Win Win no Aidagara by saida kazuaki
Am ı the only one who sees the irony here, the story is about duplicates of girls and the  third chapter is a duplicate. And this is not netorare so far.
